Description:
The FHIR Immunization resource provides a patient's immunizations, including vaccine and vaccine administration details.

The search interaction allows the client to query for a patient's immunizations. The Immunization Search endpoint allows a client to retrieve an identifier for an immunization.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to the Patient who was immunized.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
Status of the Immunization. Possible values are:

  • completed
  • entered-in-error
  • not-done

*Note: incomplete Immunizations are not supported.

If no status is specified, all statuses are returned.

doseQuantity.Name: doseQuantity
doseQuantity.Description: Information about the amount of vaccine administered.

unit.Name: unit
unit.Description: Unit of amount of vaccine administered.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: Reference to the Encounter resource in which this immunization took place.

isSubpotent.Name: isSubpotent
isSubpotent.Description: Indicates that the dose wasnâ€™t full strength. Replaces the extension "isSubpotent" in STU3.

occurrenceDateTime.Name: occurrenceDateTime
occurrenceDateTime.Description: Vaccination administration date and time (if available). Previously "date" in STU3 and earlier.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to the Patient who was immunized.

performer.Name: performer
performer.Description: Reference to a Practitioner that participated in the Immunization and the role they played in the interaction. Renamed from "practitioner" in STU3.

actor.Name: actor
actor.Description: Reference to a Practitioner that participated in the Immunization.

function.Name: function
function.Description:
The role the Practitioner played in the immunization. Renamed from "role" in STU3. Possible values include:

  • Administering Provider (AP)
  • Ordering Provider (OP)

primarySource.Name: primarySource
primarySource.Description: Whether the immunization data is historical and therefore reported by a patient or another system. If historical, "false" is returned as this system is not the primary source of the data.

reportOrigin.Name: reportOrigin
reportOrigin.Description: If Epic was not the primary source of the administration, indicates where the administration came from.

route.Name: route
route.Description: How the vaccine entered the body.

site.Name: site
site.Description: Body site where the vaccine was administered.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
Status of the Immunization. Possible values are:

  • completed
  • entered-in-error
  • not-done

*Note: incomplete Immunizations are not returned.

total.Name: total
total.Description: Total number of resources that matched the search criteria.
